title: Kerala Blasters vs Mumbai City FC, ISL 2015 Free Live Streaming: Watch Free Live Stream and Telecast of Indian Super League on Star Sports, Hotstar and starsports.com
text:
Kerala Blasters vs Mumbai City FC, ISL 2015 Free Live Streaming: Watch Free Live Stream and Telecast of Indian Super League on Star Sports, Hotstar and starsports.com By India.com Staff on October 10, 2015 at 5:45 PM Comments 
Watch the Free Live Streaming and Telecast of Indian Super League 2015 (ISL 2015) Match 8 between Kerala Blasters vs Mumbai City FC at Kochi on Saturday. You can watch the live telecast of Kerala Blasters vs Mumbai City FC match on Star Sports 2 and Star Sports 2 HD . You can also watch the Kerala Blasters vs Mumbai City FC match online via free live streaming by clicking on the live streaming link here 
Mumbai City FC are expected to ring in the changes as they seek to open their account against Kerala Blasters in a second round game of Hero Indian Super League (ISL). Mumbai City FC suffered a reverse at the hands of rivals FC Pune City in the opener. The 1-3 loss against Pune came as a big setback but Nicolas Anelka’s side has enough quality to bounce back. ISL 2015: Full Fixture list and match schedule 
Anelka, now the marquee-player-cum-manager, restricted himself to a late appearance and could not alter Mumbai’s fortunes in the short time that he spent on the field. But the former France striker can possibly start the next tie after recovering from a flu. Injured midfielder Brandon Fernandes should also be available while it remains to be seen if Anelka prefers to continue with young goalkeeper Albino Gomes or prefers to opt for the slightly more experienced Debjit Majumder, who won the I-League with Mohun Bagan last season. 
Predicted XIs 
Kerala Blasters 
Stephen Bywater; Bheke, Ramage, Chris Dagnall, CK Vineeth, Mehtab Hossain, Rafi, Bruno Perone, Marcus Williams, Peter Carvalho, Currias 
Mumbai City FC 
Mehta, Bertin, Piquionne, Keegan, Aguilera, Pratesh, Norde, Gabriel, Cmovs, Moritz, Anelka
